website_summaries.verdict: If your skin is delicate and prone to irritation, this luxury cleansing milk is worth considering for the reliable but gentle results it delivers.
pros: Users with sensitive skin rave about the gentle effectiveness of this cleanser
Does a good job removing makeup without over-stripping the skin of natural oils
Contains licorice and shea butter for soft, moisturized skin
cons: Highly scented, which may irritate sensitive skin

customer_reviews.title: gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin and this cleanser is nice but I don't feel like it moisturizes enough. Its a very gentle cleanser. After I wash my skin feels moist, but after a little while my skin feels dry again. I've used other cleansers that cost more (of course) that leave my skin feeling more smooth and moist longer. So not bad- but not as moisturizing as I'd like it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this stuff! I have been using Retin-A recently which dries out skin and makes it peel. I decided to switch to a more soothing face wash to compensate for the Retin-A. Even though I have oily skin, I feel like this stuff thoroughly cleanses my skin and removes make up. I'm definitely buying another bottle when I run out!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, this brand is top notch. I like to give a compliment now and then we all are always being so negative. This a creamy not greasy product that feels great on my sensitive skin. It lasts about 2 or 3 months depending on how much you use. I wet my face, put some in my hand, rub it on my face like soap, and wash it off with a damp washcloth.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great for my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin that dries out easily. This is gentle enough and cleanses very well. I still use a moisturizer afterwards, but my face doesn't feel like it's going to crack into pieces as soon as I step out of the shower.
customer_reviews.author: RCX

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I use it every night. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Lily

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for taking off makeup
customer_reviews.text: Can’t live without it. It’s great for taking off makeup, leaves face smooth and doesn’t Burn if it gets in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cleanser for dry skin. I am 51 years old with sensitive and dry skin and I love using this. A little bit goes a long way so the bottle lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Terri C.

customer_reviews.title: I have combination dry and oily skin that used to ...
customer_reviews.text: I have combination dry and oily skin that used to break out probably every other month. Since using this and not washing my face with harsh chemicals (I don't wash this off, I either slather it on and let it set in or wipe off excess w cotton balls) my skin is hydrated and clear!
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using L'Occitane for several years and I am very happy with it. It is light and does not clog pores.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M

customer_reviews.title: Shea milk
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years as a facial cleanser with wonderful results it removes make up completely and leaves your face nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: cloe640

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This is a great facial cleanser. I've used it before and just love it. It gives a slight sudsy texture and rinses off easily, leaving your face feeling soft and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Cleanses well with just small amount. Doesn't dry out the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new must-have
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this. It's great at cleaning my face and it leaves me skin super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Rose McC.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so much I have given if as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Paine

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product.  I use it every night to wash my face!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was visiting my daughter-in-law and saw that she uses this. Was so glad to find it!
customer_reviews.author: Texas Hill Country babe

customer_reviews.title: A good cleansing milk!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cleansing milk. It is very soothing and does the job at removing make up, leaving your skin soft and hydrated. I am not wild about the scent but it is mild enough that I don't mind it. In any case it's much better than other cleansers that strip your face.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa

customer_reviews.title: Tell the buyers about Product Smell...
customer_reviews.text: it has a sweet smell that clashes with other fragrance preferences.....the advertising should be clear about that....I would not have bought it. Buying on-line is not always a deal....I spent $20 for a product that will sit on the shelf.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

product_meta.title: L'Occitane Face Cleansing Milk, 6.7 Fl Oz
product_meta.description:
The Shea Cleansing Milk has a creamy texture to gently cleanse and remove make-up. Enriched with softening shea and soothing licorice extract, it preserves skin's natural hydration and leaves it clean, supple and comfortable.

BRAND STORY
By L'Occitane
